name: Zapdos
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: A legendary Pokémon that is said to live in thunderclouds. It freely controls lightning bolts.

poke_power.name: Sheet Lightning
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Zapdos from your hand onto your Bench, you may flip a coin. If heads, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent’s Pokémon.

attacks.name: Raging Thunder
attacks.effect: Does 40 damage to 1 of your Pokémon, and don’t apply Weakness and Resistance to this damage.
